text: Senator John McCain passed today, all i can think about..he never stopped trying to do his best. What an honor it’s been to know him. My condolences to the family he loved and adored and to his daughter & my friend @MeghanMcCain...from all my family, much love
title: Celebrities, notables react to passing of John McCain

og.title: Celebrities, notables react to passing of John McCain
og.description: Celebrities and notables across the globe took to Twitter Saturday night to express their thoughts on the passing of the senator.
